mapper.select: SELECT MMS.PLNT_CD ,MMS.MITM_SPEC_IDX ,MMS.MITM_CD ,MMS.AITM_SPEC_IDX ,SDPROC.DTL_NM AS SPEC_PROC_NM ,MMS.SPEC_PROC_CD ,MMS.DEL_YN ,MMS.USE_VER_YN ,MMS.RVS_NO ,MMS.DOC_NO ,MMS.RVS_DT ,MMS.ENFO_DT ,MMS.RVS_REA_CD ,MMS.RVS_CTT ,MMS.RVS_DIV_PS ,MMS.REVW_UID ,SU1.USER_NM AS REVW_UNM ,MMS.REVW_DS ,MMS.REVW_IP ,MMS.MITM_SPEC_APR_IDX ,MMS.RJT_UID ,SU2.USER_NM AS RJT_UNM ,MMS.RJT_DS ,MMS.RJT_REA ,MMAS.AITM_SPEC_VER FROM MM_MITM_SPEC MMS LEFT JOIN MM_MITM_AITM_SPEC MMAS ON MMS.PLNT_CD = MMAS.PLNT_CD AND MMS.AITM_SPEC_IDX = MMAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL SDPROC ON MMS.PLNT_CD = SDPROC.PLNT_CD AND MMS.SPEC_PROC_CD = SDPROC.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU1 ON MMS.REVW_UID = SU1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU2 ON MMS.RJT_UID = SU2.USER_ID WHERE MMS.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MITM_CD = #{mitmCd} AND MMS.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT MMSA.PLNT_CD , MMSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX , MMSA.AITM_SEQ , M.AITM_KN , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , MMSA.ANS_DPT_CD , MMSA.AMITM_CD , MMSA.AITM_ORD , MMSA.PERSPEC_TXT , MMSA.OWC_SPEC_TXT , MMSA.SPEC_TXT_EN , MMSA.SPEC_TYP , MMSA.JDG_TYP , MMSA.PER_SLV_LOW , MMSA.PER_SLV_UPP , MMSA.PER_SLV_DESC , MMSA.OWC_SLV_LOW , MMSA.OWC_SLV_UPP , MMSA.OWC_SLV_DESC , MMSA.SLV_JDG_CFM , MMSA.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , MMSA.RST_UNIT_CD , MMSA.RST_DPNT , MMSA.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , MMSA.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , MMSA.RPT_PRT_YN , MMSA.ISP_DPT_CD , MMSA.SMP_CLLT_QTY , MMSA.SMP_CLLT_UNIT , MMSA.ISP_DUR_TM , MMSA.EQM_USE_TM FROM MM_MITM_SPEC_AITM MMSA LEFT JOIN MS_AMITM MA ON MMSA.AMITM_CD = MA.AMITM_CD LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON SUBSTR(MMSA.AMITM_CD, 0, 6) = M.AITM_CD WHERE MMSA.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND MMSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx}

SELECT M.AITM_CD , M.AITM_KN , M.AITM_EN , M.AITM_ABBR , MA.AMITM_CD , MA.AITM_CD , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , MA.VRIA_EN , MA.RMK , MA.USE_YN FROM MS_AMITM MA LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON MA.AITM_CD = M.AITM_CD WHERE 1=1
AND MA.VRIA_KN LIKE '%' || #{vriaKn} || '%'
AND M.AITM_KN LIKE '%' || #{aitmKn} || '%'
ORDER BY MA.AITM_CD

SELECT (SELECT NVL(MAX(MITM_SPEC_IDX)+1,1) FROM MM_MITM_SPEC WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd}) AS MITM_SPEC_IDX ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(AITM_SPEC_IDX)+1,1) FROM MM_MITM_AITM_SPEC WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd}) AS AITM_SPEC_IDX FROM DUAL
SELECT DPT_CD AS VALUE , DPT_NM AS LABEL FROM SY_DPT WHERE HIR_DPT_CD = #{crgDptCd}
